metadata.title: Jérémie Pouliot | Junior web developer
metadata.description: Portfolio website showcasing my journey, skills, and experiences as a web developer

About.title: My Journey
BeginningCarpentryDesc: I started my career in carpentry school, learning the fundamentals of woodworking, precision tools, and measurements.
More than just technical skills, this experience taught me discipline, punctuality, and a strong attention to detail—qualities that continue to shape my approach to work.
ProfessionalExperienceDesc: After graduating, I spent four years on construction sites, collaborating with experienced carpenters. This hands-on experience strengthened my problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

Every day, teamwork and clear communication were essential to ensuring smooth project execution. Through these challenges, I developed patience and perseverance—two qualities that now define my approach to coding.
TransitionWebDevDesc: Looking for a new challenge, I enrolled in an intensive 8-month ACS program in web development. The fast-paced curriculum demanded dedication, and by the end, only a dozen students remained out of the original 30.

While I enjoyed carpentry, the industry's rigid structure and physical demands made me reconsider my path. The opportunity to transition into tech—where creativity, logic, and continuous learning thrive—was exactly what I needed.
About.SkillDevelopmentDesc: Throughout 2023, I refined my skills in React through Udemy courses, explored Java and found a job, which helped me solidify my interest in frontend development. Breaking into the industry wasn't easy, but each challenge, including job interviews, provided valuable insights that strengthened my determination and skill set.
About.ReadyForImpactDesc: Now, I'm available and eager to apply my expertise and problem-solving mindset to meaningful projects, contributing to innovative and impactful development work.

Experience.AECDesc: 8-month intensive web development program at Cegep de Sherbrooke
AECTasks: Front-end development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and introduction to Wordpress, Laravel and Bootstap.
Back-end development with PHP, and database management with SQL.
Web project management, version control with Git & Github, and cloud deployment (Azure)
Full-stack integration, performance optimization, best practices in accessibility and security
Experience.WebDevDesc: Junior web developer at InnovaKey, specialized in frontend development
WebDevTasks: Development and maintenance of responsive and dynamic user interfaces using Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.
Integration of APIs and third-party services to enhance functionality and data processing.
Implementation of modular and reusable components for efficient and scalable code structure.
Performance optimization, debugging, and ensuring best practices in accessibility and security.
